instructions: How do I manage portfolio risk?
response: Risk Management: 1) Position sizing (risk max 2-5% per trade), 2) Diversification (don't put all in one token), 3) Stop losses (always set), 4) Take profits (lock in gains), 5) Portfolio rebalancing (weekly/monthly), 6) Hedge strategies (use options or stables).

Impermanent Loss (IL) happens when token prices diverge from when you entered. Example: You LP $1000 50/50 (ETH/USDC). ETH doubles in price. Your LP position underperforms holding the original tokens by ~5.7%. It's 'impermanent' because it reverses if prices return. IL is the cost of providing liquidity.

instructions: How to optimize gas fees on Solana?
